comment.author: 31953721@N04
comment._content: Did he actually write any of his poetry during the war? I see in the Google book of his that some of them are dated during the Civil War, but I wonder if he was inflating/changing the dates?

comment.author: 66041448@N00
comment._content: Painting of John Alexander Joyce A digital painting rendered with Corel Paint Shop Pro and Corel Painter, along with a Wacom tablet with pressure sensitive stylus to apply brush strokes. This painting is based this photo uploaded by DC Public Library Commons. Appreciate the detail of this painting in the larger view at: www.flickr.com/photos/paddrick/5822479740/sizes/o/in/phot...
